summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Third Avenue N.W. from West Kilbourne Street to West 45th Street et al in the City of Seattle, by grading & curbing under Ordinance No. 12909, creating Local Improvement District No. 1142 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
